summary: Multi-page web/app flow with a reply box and navigation between pages, including saving/editing replies and a final farewell page with animation.

existing_features.title: Update the third page (ReplyPage) reply box so the user can edit the reply content by tapping/clicking the content (in-place edit) and can save it using a Save button placed at the end (bottom) of the reply box.
Add a Next button on the third page (ReplyPage) that navigates to a new fourth page.
Create a fourth page that displays the provided parting message exactly as given by the user, and play a kissing animation automatically when the page is opened that lasts 5 seconds.

new_feature_requests.summary: Add a Save button at the end of the reply box that saves the reply content.
Allow the saved reply content to be edited by touching/tapping the content (in-place edit).
Add a Next button on the third page to navigate to a fourth page displaying the provided parting content message.
On opening the fourth page, play a kissing animation lasting 5 seconds.

projectName: Add editable reply with Save button, add Farewell page with 5-second kissing animation
